snippet: A man with a gun and a chain saw in his car was detained Monday by the police near the European Parliament, prompting the temporary evacuation of several buildings.
abstract: Belgian authorities say armed man identified as W R was arrested after seeking meeting with European Parliament president, which led to evacuation of several buildings; W R is charged with threatening attack and possessing unauthorized weapons.
lead_paragraph: A man with a gun and a chain saw in his car was detained Monday by the police near the European Parliament, prompting the temporary evacuation of several buildings.

headline.main: Belgium: Man Accused of Threat Close to Parliament
headline.print_headline: Belgium: Man Accused of Threat Close to Parliament
